messages.details: supercompressionScheme is KTX_SS_ZLIB but it must either be BASIS_LZ for ETC1S or either NONE or ZSTD for UASTC textures for KHR_texture_basisu compatibility.

messages.message: Incompatible supercompressionScheme and colorModel for KHR_texture_basisu compatibility.
messages.details: DFD block #1 colorModel is KHR_DF_MODEL_UASTC while supercompressionScheme is KTX_SS_ZLIB but KHR_texture_basisu requires supercompressionScheme KTX_SS_NONE or KTX_SS_ZSTD for this colorModel.
